question: Posted By Erin on September 03, 1998 at 23:43:04:In Reply to: overactive bladder posted by Jerry Fabian on August 29, 1998 at 17:37:20:I too have the same problem.  I have to urinate all the time and it's not a UTI or diabetes.  It's not tinkle tinkle either, it's a full bladder pee.  I just want to feel like I can travel or work without getting fired and go out on a date without them thinking I'm a peeing spazoid! Any help would be appreciated.
title: Re: overactive bladder
